head.title: How to configure Phenomic
head.description: You have multiple things you can tweak to adjust the behavior of Phenomic to your needs. Phenomic core configuration for built-in featuresâ€¦

body:
You have multiple things you can tweak to adjust the behavior of Phenomic to your needs.

  • Phenomic core configuration for built-in features
  • Webpack configuration to adjust some build step and behavior of consumed files (CSS, JS, MD...)
  • react-helmet to handle HTML head/meta of pages

Be also sure to check out the plugins section for custom needs for files.
